text: 34|16|eninum, avarkal (ataip) purakkanittu(p pavattil alntu) vittanar. (Akave, avarkal kattiyirunta makattanatoru anaiyai utaikkakkutiya) perum vellattai avarkalukkuk ketaka anuppivaittom. Avarkalutaiya (unnatamana kanikalaiyutaiya) iru colaikalaik kacappum, pulippumulla kaykalaiyutaiya marankalalum, cila ilantai marankalalum nirampiya toppukalaka marrivittom
